runs.comm: he is gone first-ball again! Wonderful delivery first up but an atrocious shot! It's full and fast and straight and Irfan plays a limp drive. He plays down the wrong line and the ball flicks the off stump en route to the keeper. The bail on the other side comes off. What a start for Afghanistan!
cracker of a delivery for the captain! This one takes off from a length and beats the outside edge, the keeper takes it chest high..
on target from Shapoor! It's quick, back of length and on off stump. The batsman stays in the crease and defends it to the off side
he angles this one across the right hander who lets it go through to the keeper

very very lucky for Atkinson this time! He goes for an aggressive pull to a short of length delivery, but gets hurried by the pace. The top edge hangs in the air for some time before landing just between midwicket and mid-on. Lucky
back of length delivery outside off, the batsman pushes it to off to pick up a quick single
another tight single as the batsman dabs it to cover and scampers through
length delivery on off stump, Atkinson comes forward and defends this to off
this one is wayward, goes down the leg side
he walks a couple of paces outside the crease and defends the length delivery to the off side
nicely picks the gap to find the first boundary! He comes forward and punches the length delivery through cover point with ease, Naib's pace being comfortably handled off the front foot here
he takes a positive step out and defends the length delivery to the off side
he is beaten as he chases this wide half-volley. He didn't move his feet far enough to reach the ball though
looks for a yorker outside off, but it's a low full toss. The batsman fails to take advantage as he pushes this without timing to cover
full and wide outside off, this is quick from Shapoor, around 139 kph. Atkinson presses forward to drive this to cover, but is a touch late and gets beaten
this is convincingly pulled by Atkinson! It was a touch short and didn't rise up that much, the batsman was ready for that, swivels and whacks it over square leg
beautifully driven through extra cover! Atkinson doesn't fall into the trap of full-followed-by-short-one.. He moves forward nicely and crunches this one wide of the lone mid-off fielder
he takes a forward step and dabs the length delivery to wide mid-off for an easy single
looks for a yorker, but this is a low full toss outside off. The batsman is a touch too slow to come forward and edges this one fine through the off side to pick up a couple
Atkinson walks down the pitch like Pietersen, comfortably defends the length delivery down the pitch. With his size, he has that KP like presence on the pitch

yes, this is exactly like KP! He chooses to stay in the crease and hammers the short delivery over midwicket with a murderous pull. He actually made the bowler bowl that short delivery. Wonderful. Imperious
now Naib loses direction, bowls this one down the leg side
he means business! This is full outside off and it's clobbered over the non-striker's head for a one-bounce four. Atkinson is fast erasing the memories of that first-ball loss
he walks down the pitch too early and gets a slow ball bouncer in return, adjusts late to dab it to short fine leg for a quick single
the last thing you need now is a misfield! Barkat comes forward and just times the length delivery through off, it goes through the cover fielder. That should have been stopped
finally he gets some extra bounce from the pitch and beats the bat, but this has been one expensive over
pushed through on off stump, the batsman punches it to mid-on for a single
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman eases it to that fielder at long on
quicker delivery, but this is on the pads and Atkinson swivels quickly to whip this fine on the leg side. No chance for the short fine leg fielder

that is the end of a wonderful short innings from Atkinson! This was tossed up, it drifted in and went straight with the arm to strike the batsman on the front pad. Atkinson was playing for the turn and pushes outside the line. The umpire waits for a bit but rightly raises his finger. That would have gone to hit middle and leg
flatter delivery on the pads, Chapman stays in the crease and punches it to deep midwicket for a couple of runs
he waits on the back foot and punches it to cover
full and outside off, the batsman punches it to long off for a single
full and outside off, Chapman drives it straight to cover
some turn for Shenwari, it comes in after pitching on off, the batsman defends it to cover
quicker delivery on off stump, the batsman punches it towards mid-off
shorter and quicker on the stumps, the batsman nudges it to the left of midwicket for a quick single
bowls a slider that Barkat didn't have much clue about. He hangs his bat and it hits the batsman on the pads, but this one would have gone down the leg side
walks down the pitch, but the bowler bowls it a touch slow, the batsman defends it down the pitch
comes down the pitch and drives the full delivery to long on for a single
tossed up and slower outside off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
flatter and quicker on off stump, the batsman punches it to long on for a single
full delivery on off stump, the batsman drives it down to long off
flatter delivery on the stumps, the batsman dabs it to mid on for a single
bowls a flipped on off stump, the batsman stays back and punches this to long off for a single
walks down the pitch and punches the flatter delivery back to the bowler
another quick flat delivery, the batsman comes out of the crease and punches it to long on
flatter delivery on the stumps, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
flighted and full on off stump, the batsman drives it straight to extra cover
on the pads and the batsman places it with soft hands at the vacant midwicket region. They come back for a second
good first delivery! back of length on off stump, quick too. The batsman defends it to the off side
this is a cracker of a shot! The batsman makes a little room and thrashes the length delivery through extra cover with a punchy drive

oye hoye! That has hit him on the grill of the helmet! The batsman didn't help himself by moving down the pitch to a quick 142.5 kph short delivery. He looks to pull, but misses and gets smacked on the grill and goes down. He is smiling though. That was a boxer's jab. He is changed the helmet. Well that balances it out a bit between the bowler and the batsman, with the bowler letting him know that he has the pace to rattle
another short delivery, but this is down the leg side and  clips the thigh pad to go fine on the leg side. What more, Dawlat has overstepped.
he makes room to blast it through the off side, 144 kph, but misses the length delivery completely

this one is quick too! He goes short with the length and it flies past the helmet again. Shahzad has to leap and he only gets a hand to that. Oh no, the umpire calls it a no-ball. That was an excellent delivery to me
he dabs it to the off side for a quick single, 143 kph. The bowler gets to the ball, turns and fires a throw at the non-striker's end, but misses. Would have been tight
bowls a length delivery on the pads at 136 kph, the batsman looks to nudge it to the leg side, but misses. The ball grazes the pads on its way to third man
he comes down the pitch and throws his bat at that one, but doesn't get any timing as he plays it to deep midwicket
tossed up delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it down the pitch
comes down the pitch and chips it to long on for a single
clears his front foot and whacks it across the line to deep midwicket
on the pads and Barkat finds the gap at fine leg with a carefully controlled sweep, it beats the man at deep backward square leg
flatter delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it to midwicket
is that a missed stumping! The batsman created room and wanted to smash it through off side, he misses and Shahzad misses too..He had dragged his feet out, so yes, it is a chance
looks to reverse sweep and misses this one. Good take by Shahzad this time

short delivery, pulled high up towards deep midwicket where two fielder's converge, but the fielder from deep square leg doesn't get under it.. What more, he misses and is slides under the legs of the second to reach the rope
now take this one! Chapman has got some serious bat behind that. This was leg-sidish and it's flicked away with awesome power over square leg. The fielder there can watch it go to the crowd...
he stays in the crease and punches this to long off for a single
stays in the crease and chops this one to short third man
flattter delivery, Chapman is on a roll here, he comes out of the crease and slaps it to deep midwicket. Good work by the fielder to keep it in
fuller delivery on the stumps, the batsman punches it to deep midwicket
this is nicely chipped over the bowler's head, very nicely played shot and safe too
he comes down the pitch and this one is beautifully hit over extra cover! Again, no power, just pure timing.  The ball was not full enough so even more points for that control in that shot

there is an appeal for stumping as Barkat plays inside the line of a fuller delivery! Shahzad takes the bails in a flash. The third umpire is checking this but this could be a no-ball.. very close for Nabi. I think he should he ok, although very tight. Barkat should be safe too, he dragged his back foot well in time
flighted delivery on off stump, Barkat drives it to wide long on for a single
he is created with a punchy straight drive! Hotak does well to stick his boot out to stop that

what has happened here! Hamza hotak has taken all three stumps down but looks like Chapman is going to survive! Barkat sliced it to point, but Chapman ran halfway down the middle. The throw comes to Hotak and all he needed to do was take the ball and flick the stumps as Chapman is nowhere near. But, he throws himself on to the stumps. Unfortunately the ball is not in his hands. What a waste...
comes out of the pitch and punches the full delivery to long off where a misfield allows a second
he comes out of the crease again and softly dabs this one to deep midwicket for a single
he comes out of the crease and also makes room, then he chips it over the bowler's head for a couple of runs
flatter and shorter, the batsman tries a reverse pull, but doesn't fully get hold of this as he plays it to short third man
full and on the blockhole, the batsman digs it out towards long on
he comes down the pitch and is early on the chip shot, this goes high, but lands safely between the long on and long off fielders
oh no, he was playing that chip shot so well and he chooses to play a scoop instead! This is exactly like Misbah getting out in the World T20 final in 2007! An easy catch for short fine leg fielder
he comes down the pitch and looks to hit across the line, but inside edges it to short fine leg
quicker delivery outside off, the batsman punches it to extra cover
he stays in the crease and punches this to deep cover for a single
starts off with a quick length delivery outside off that beats the batsman's flashy drive
fuller delivery on the pads, the batsman drives it straight to midwicket
cramps him for room as he targets the leg stump, the batsman tucks it to square leg for a single
fires in a yorker outside off, the batsman digs it out to deep cover
wow! Chapman aims to guide this low full toss to the square leg boundary, but it takes a leading edge and flies to the deep backward point boundary. Welcome runs
he walks across to the off side and whips the length delivery to midwicket
he comes out of the crease, takes this one on the full and punches it down to long on
this one is beautifully timed through extra cover! Babar steps out of the crease, takes the flighted delivery on the full and caresses it though extra cover
well, he has the memory of that previous shot at least! He sweeps this one, but gets a thick top edge that is easily taken at deep square leg
he punches the flatter delivery straight to extra cover
looks to punch this through long on, but gets a thick inside edge on to his pads
he fires this one full but this is down the leg side. Well taken by Shahzad
he punches this quicker delivery but is not able to beat the bowler
quick short of length delivery on the stumps, the batsman pushes it to mid on for a single
he has given it away! Chapman moves across to the off side to flick this one fine on the leg side, misses and looses his leg stump. That was a little too quick for him..141.5 kph
chance of a run out at the non-striker's end! But he survives. The batsman dabbed it to mid-on and wasn't going anywhere, but the non striker had walked down the pitch.. Direct hit would have had him
full and on the stumps, the batsman digs it out towards midwicket
fuller delivery outside off, the batsman slices it through cover for a single
he bowls a low full toss on the stumps, the batsman punches it back to the bowler, who parries it to the leg side for a couple of runs
full and wide delivery outside off, the batsman misses it completely! And the keeper misses it too
what a shot this one! Sails all the way to deep extra cover boundary. He makes room and drives it over extra cover with an inside out shot.. Well played
flatter delivery, Nizakat tries the repeat of the previous shot, but he doesn't get any elevation this time. it's hit straight to the extra cover fielder
flatter and quicker on the stumps, the batsman dabs it to the leg side for a single
he goes for the reverse sweep at a wide delivery, misses completely
walks across to the off side, but Hotak fires it too far down the leg side. The keeper had no chance
he comes forward and pushes this to deep midwicket with soft hands and comes back for a second
full and on off, the batsman can only dig this out to cover. Nabi had a chance to get the non-striker out as he was halfway down the pitch, but he misses the direct hit

this time there is a direct hit! The batsman dabs it to mid off and calls for a quick one, but the fielder fires a throw and breaks the stumps at the striker's end. Dar was well short. Good thinking by the fielder to target the slower of the two runners
fuller length delivery outside off, too quick for Amjad who throws his bat, but makes no connection
slower delivery on the stumps, it's a full toss that is pushes to deep cover
this one has gone all the way! Whoa! That is gotta be Dawlat's pace. The batsman flashes hard and gets a thick outside edge that sails over the third man fielder
this one is much better blow! It's a full delivery and he gets under it in time to launch it over the infield to the extra cover boundary
full and on the off stump, the batsman drives it uppishly to deep cover

good running catch at wide long on by Naib! Tanwir aimed to go over the boundary with a cross-batted swipe but didn't get the distance he would have liked. Naib runs to his right from long on to take it comfortably in the end
full and outside off, the batsman looks to go inside out but plays inside the line. It misses the off stump by a whisker
full and on the stumps, the batsman slices it down to third man for a single
low full toss outside off, the batsman gets a thick inside edge to deep midwicket for a single
a lower full toss outside off, the batsman slices it over point to finish with a boundary
